field.name: UI Rendering Globals
field.definition: miscellaneous rendering globals, more below...

field.name: near clip plane distance
field.units: objects closer than this are not drawn

field.name: projection plane distance
field.units: distance at which objects are rendered when z=0 (normal size)

field.name: far clip plane distance
field.units: objects farther than this are not drawn

field.name: Overlayed UI Color
field.definition: This is the color of the overlayed ui effect; the alpha component is the maximum opacity

field.name: Displayed Errors
field.definition: For each error condition displayed in the UI, set the title and description string ids here

definition.entry: error need more space for saved game
error saved game cannot be loaded
error confirm controller signout with guests
error warning player in mm game
error xblive failed to sign in
error cant sign out master with guests
error confirm party leader leave matchmaking
error confirm single box leave matchmaking
error warning last overlord cant leave clan
error confirm party member leave pcr
error cannot sign in during countdown
error confirm exit game session leader
error confirm change clan member level
confirm exit game session only player
confirm exit game session xbox live ranked leader
confirm exit game session xbox live ranked
confirm exit game session xbox live leader
confirm exit game session xbox live only player
confirm exit game session xbox live
xblive connection to xbox live lost save and quit
cant join friend while in matchmade game
choose new checkpoint location (checkpoints exist on live and local)
choose new checkpoint location (checkpoints exist on live)
choose new checkpoint location (checkpoints exist locally)

field.name: Cursor Sound
field.definition: This is the sound that plays as you tab through items

field.name: Selection Sound
field.definition: This is the sound that plays when an item is selected

field.name: Error Sound
field.definition: This is the sound that plays to alert the user that something went wrong

field.name: Advancing Sound
field.definition: This is the sound that plays when advancing to a new screen

field.name: Retreating Sound
field.definition: This is the sound that plays when retreating to a previous screen

field.name: Initial Login Sound
field.definition: This is the sound that plays when advancing past the initial login screen

field.name: VKBD Cursor Sound
field.definition: This is the sound that plays when cursoring in the vkeyboard

field.name: VKBD Character Insertion Sound
field.definition: This is the sound that plays when selecting buttons in the vkeyboard

field.name: Online Notification Sound
field.definition: This is the sound that plays when you receive an online notification

field.name: Tabbed View Pane Tabbing Sound
field.definition: This is the sound that plays when tabbing thru views in a tabbed view pane (eg, online menu)

field.name: Pregame Countdown Timer Sound
field.definition: This is the sound that plays as the countdown timer progresses

field.name: Matchmaking Advance Sound
field.definition: This is the sound that plays as matchmaking enters the final stage

field.name: Global Bitmaps
field.definition: Sprite sequences for global ui bitmaps, as follows: 1) vkeyboard cursor

field.name: Global Text Strings
field.definition: Global UI Text goes here

field.name: Screen Animations
field.definition: Animations used by screen definitions for transitions and ambient animating

field.name: Primary Intro Transition
field.definition: Defines the primary intro transitional animation

field.name: Primary Outro Transition
field.definition: Defines the primary outro transitional animation

field.name: Ambient Animation
field.definition: Defines the ambient animation

field.name: Polygonal Shape Groups
field.definition: Define the various groups of shape-objects for use on any ui screens here

field.name: Unused Debug Geometry Shapes
field.definition: This is the old way

field.name: Model-Light Groups
field.definition: Specify commonly used model/light groups here

field.name: NOTE on coordinate systems
field.definition: Halo y-axis=ui z-axis, and Halo z-axis=ui y-axis. As a convention, let's always place objects in the ui scenario such that they are facing in the '-y' direction, and the camera such that is is facing the '+y' direction. This way the ui animation for models (which gets applied to the camera) will always be consisitent.

field.name: Bitmaps
field.definition: Specify more flavor bitmaps here

definition.entry: ignore for list skin size calculation

field.name: Persistant Background Animations
field.definition: These are the animations used by elements that live in the persistant background

field.name: List Skins
field.definition: These define the visual appearances (skins) available for UI lists They are expected to be entered in the following order: 0) default 1) squad lobby player list 2) settings list 3) playlist entry list 4) variants list 5) game browser list 6) online player menu 7) game setup menu 8) playlist contents display 9) profile picker 10) mp map list 11) main menu

field.name: Additional UI Strings
field.definition: These are for specific purposes as noted

field.name: WINDOW PARAMETERS
field.definition: Various settings for different sized UI windows
